channel.title: Finally Dawn on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Finally Dawn on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Lily James Previews Her Upcoming Film Slate of ‘Finally Dawn,’ ‘Relay’ and ‘Cliffhanger’
item.description: The star became obsessed with mountain climbing to prepare for the remake of the 1993 Sylvester Stallone movie: “I did five hours of climbing a day for many weeks.”
